sql-script.name: script
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_dict ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), domainid char(32), name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, dictmark tinyint not null, description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(name), unique(oorder) );

create table sf_dict_item ( id char(32) not null, dictid char(32) not null, parentid char(32), domainid char(32), text varchar(128) not null, codeno varchar(128), createDate datetime, userid char(32), description varchar(256), ext1 varchar(64), ext2 int not null, ext3 varchar(64), ext4 bigint not null, oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(dictid, codeno), unique(oorder) );
create table sf_dict_item_stat ( id char(32) not null, dictid char(32), domainid char(32), nums int not null, primary key(id) );
